name: stack-overflow-indentation
description: A browser extension that enables rich IDE-like tabbing/shift-tabbing indentation on Stack Overflow and Meta Stack Overflow.

scripts.build-v3: tsc && rimraf -rf ./dist-v3 && parcel watch --no-hmr manifest-v3/manifest.json --dist-dir dist-v3 --config @parcel/config-webextension
scripts.build-v2: tsc && rimraf -rf ./dist-v2 && parcel watch --no-hmr manifest-v2/manifest.json --dist-dir dist-v2 --config @parcel/config-webextension

author: NathanC
